column5: CYCC I am buying hand over fist 20 year hard race and we are 100 feet from the finish line No time to walk of the field

CYCC Interesting point i have learned after getting into Biotech People including myself keep looking at this as a great value stock as its BV is far more then its Market Value value investing Value in biotech is all subject to intangibles and the results of their clinical trials and researchThe problem with looking at Book value is that these companies dont earn ANY revenue The assets cash continues to burn without any revenue source to fund As such long term the BV and assets of the company continues to decrease
